description: A tool to transform surfaces from one space to another using image transforms.

transform.title: Transform
transform.description: Image-to-image transform file, e.g., LTA or M3Z.

trx_src.title: Transform Source Image
trx_src.description: Specify the source geometry if the transform was created by MNI/mritotal or FSL/flirt.

trx_dst.title: Transform Destination Image
trx_dst.description: Specify the destination geometry if the transform does not include this information or the path in the M3Z is invalid.

is_inverse.title: Inverse Flag
is_inverse.description: Use this option when using a transform from destination to source space.
